title: Lorraine Golosow, MD
xml:
<map name="1926087" theme="prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Lorraine Golosow, MD" id="1"><topic position="-583,0" order="1" id="2"><text><![CDATA[Dr. Lorraine Golosow is a premier Southwest Florida plastic surgeon who gives top quality cosmetic surgical care at Associates in Cosmetic
Surgery. Dr. Lorraine Golosow is a plastic surgeon certified by the American Board of Plastic Surgery, and additionally by the American
Board of Surgery. She is a member of the American Society of Plastic Surgeons and the American Medical Association. She is a member of the Lee
County Medical Society and served as Chief of Plastic Surgery at Lee Memorial Hospital from 2002-- 2004. Dr. Lorraine Golosow was the very
first female plastic surgeon in Lee County to become certified by the Board of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery. Dr. Golosow is originally
from Denver, Colorado. She finished her undergraduate studies at the College of William and Mary and went to medical school at the
University of Colorado Health and Science Center. She then completed a five year general surgery residency at Case Western Reserve University. She
then pursued a two year fellowship in plastic and reconstructive surgery at Indiana University. Dr. Golosow is affiliated with Lee Memorial Hospital,
Healthpark Hospital, Gulf Coast Hospital, Southwest Regional Medical Center, Lehigh Regional Hospital and Southwest Florida Institute
of Ambulatory Surgery.]]></text></topic><topic position="333,0" order="0" id="3"><text><![CDATA[• 239-369-3456
• judy@abodyandface.com
• https://www.lorrainegolosowmd.com
• 1530 Lee Blvd Suite 1800, Lehigh Acres, FL 33901, United States]]></text></topic></topic></map>
